row.entry: This module is an artistic feature that create "soft" image.

sect3.title: Usage
sect3.para: Soften is used to create a soft image, by blurring and increasing saturation and or brightness.

sect4.title: size
sect4.para: Set lower threshold, expressed as a percentage of the maximal brightness.

sect4.title: saturation
sect4.para: Set the saturation of the resulting image.

sect4.title: brightness
sect4.para: Expressed in [EV], the brightness slider selects the increase in brightness.

sect4.title: mix
sect4.para: You can use the mix slider to select the strength of the effect.
